backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing bird records, user profiles, team data, and access control with blob storage integration and role‑based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing build‑related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files with detailed descriptions of their behavior.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx with Arabic language settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app file with router setup, lazy‑loaded pages, splash screen, error boundaries, and enhanced loading/error fallbacks.
Map component showing bird locations with audio, image popups, filtering, and WebGL‑aware behavior.
frontend/src/components/BirdDataTable.ts: Admin and user data‑management table for bird records with editing, uploads, deletion, export, and role‑based controls.
Displays detailed info for a bird, including images, audio playback, editing fields, and file handling via storage hooks.
frontend/src/components/BirdGallery.tsx: Shows a gallery of bird species with images, audio, delete options, and navigation to detailed pages.
frontend/src/components/BirdSelector.tsx: A dropdown selector for choosing a bird from a list, with loading state support.
frontend/src/components/DeferredComponen: Delays rendering of heavy components using timed priorities and fallback placeholders.
frontend/src/components/DesertOwlScene.t: Renders a static desert owl hero image with WebGL detection fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/DesertOwlSceneCo: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EagleOwlPage.tsx: Displays eagle owl species on an interactive map with filtering, images, and WebGL fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches UI errors and shows a styled fallback with retry and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/ExcelUploader.ts: Empty file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Provides a global React error boundary that catches unhandled errors and shows a styled Arabic error screen with reload support.
frontend/src/components/ImageViewPage.ts: Full‑screen image viewer with zoom, rotation, navigation, and close controls for browsing image arrays.
frontend/src/components/Interactive3DMap: Renders a 3D map using react-three-fiber with WebGL detection and a static 2D fallback for unsupported devices.
frontend/src/components/Interactive3DOwl: Displays a 3D owl sprite with optional interaction and a static fallback when WebGL is unavailable.
Progressively loads gallery items in scroll-triggered batches to reduce memory usage.
frontend/src/components/LazyMapComponent: Delays map rendering using a deferred loader and shows a placeholder until initialization completes.
frontend/src/components/MainHeader.tsx: Main site header with navigation, authentication-aware menu items, and a manual data refresh button.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive Leaflet map that loads dynamically, validates coordinates, and shows custom markers with optional image popups.
frontend/src/components/MemoryRecoveryNo: Displays an auto‑dismissing notification warning users about a memory‑related UI reload.
frontend/src/components/OfficialAlBuraim: Embeds the official Al Buraimi map in a responsive iframe.
frontend/src/components/OwlGallery.tsx: Renders a gallery of bird species with images, audio playback, uploads, and detailed modal views.
frontend/src/components/PermissionManage: UI for assigning user roles, validating principals, and restricting access to app managers.
frontend/src/components/SafeInteractive3: Loads a 3D owl viewer with deferred loading and fallback static images for reliability.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen animated splash screen with owl imagery and an enter button triggering a fade‑out transition.
frontend/src/components/Static3DAlBuraim: Renders a non-interactive 3D map of Al Buraimi using react-three-fiber with texture loading, lighting, and a fixed camera view.
frontend/src/components/StaticAlBuraimiM: Provides upload, restore, and validation logic for managing the official static Al Buraimi map with retries, backend checks, and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/StatisticsPage.t: Displays bird and location statistics with charts, data fetching hooks, a custom download-to-image function, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/TeamDataTable.ts: Shows a static RTL table listing team members, followers, and project roles with basic responsive styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, auto-refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and stored identity restoration through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemoryOptimization: React hook that monitors memory usage, triggers recovery, and shows notifications using a memory manager.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query helpers for cache invalidation, forced data sync, and bird‑related query management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme and styles, including color variables, splash screen, animations, and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/memoryManager.ts: MemoryManager class that monitors JS heap usage, triggers warnings or auto‑recovery, and exposes memory stats.
frontend/src/lib/requiredAssets.ts: Registry validating required asset paths at build time and providing safe access to them.
frontend/src/lib/webglDetector.ts: Utility functions to detect WebGL support, decide fallback behavior on mobile, and normalize bird names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: React page composing the main header, a 3D owl hero scene, goal text, a static map, a team table, and a footer within styled RTL sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, extended utilities, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, known build issues, and project state versioning.
